pages.text: Integrated Dynamics offers versatile storage solutions using logic networks and advanced automation. $(br2)Store and access items efficiently with variable-driven interfaces.
Use the Variable Store to store logic variables, and craft an Item Interface to connect your storage system. $(br2)Connect the Item Interface to a logic network to access all your items.
For a unified storage solution, use the Storage Terminal to browse your entire network easily. $(br2)Combine it with an Energy Battery and Fluid Interface for power and fluid management.
For more details on getting started with Integrated Dynamics, check out the full entry elsewhere in the guide.
